text: <@U04EJHVD8FM> Sorry one hopefully last quick question. I'm using a button to open a new window as we discussed. But I need to pass the object id to the url, and i've attempted to append it about 10 different ways and I'm sure I'm missing something simple. Appreciate any advice you have.

I'd suggest using template literals here
```href={`<http://www.HubSpot.com/foo?obj-id={hs_object_id}`|www.HubSpot.com/foo?obj-id={hs_object_id}`>}```
<https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Template_literals>
Thanks, I'll stop bothering you now!
